Dead by Daylight - это многопользовательский хоррор с асимметричным мультиплеером, в котором игроки могут разыгрывать любимые сцены из хоррор-фильмов. Четверым игрокам-"жертвам" предстоит противостоять одному маньяку-убийца, которого можно выбрать из большого списка. От игроков требуется или покинуть территорию на которой орудет маньяк, или же переловить всех "выживших" до того, как они покинут район. Соответственно различается и геймплей каждой из сторон.

Игроки не знают, где находится маньяк, и им требуется сделать несколько разных действий перед тем, как они покинут зону. Маньяк в то же время обладает набором различных способностей, которые позволяют ему противостоять выжившим, однако он один, и в одиночку справиться со всеми уцелевшими не в состоянии. Поэтому ему приходится тщательно обследовать территорию, отыскивая спрятавшихся выживших и пытаться сделать так, чтобы они никуда не сбежали.

(c) Канобу
Поиск игроков просто пиздец. Ты новичок с 1 уровнем а тебе блять маньяк с 100. Круто
new update is so very bad so long hit for killrer  ping and toxic play
Une tuerie, un des meilleurs jeux auquel j'ai pu jouer.

去年9月和室友一起入的坑，单边人类，刚开始玩的时候的确很难上手，每一局在被屠夫看到的时候就差不多结束了———直接一挂到死（队友不会顶着屠夫救人，屠夫大部分守尸）。刚开始玩的时候都认为活着最重要，但之后会逐渐发现团队协作才是最重要也是最精髓的。（最开始只要自己跑出去就会很开心，玩得多了发现有的时候其实就算自己没跑出去，队友跑出去了也是很开心的，甚至比自己跑出去更开心。）300多个小时，什么人都遇到过。有拼命来救你的，有当着屠夫面对你所在的柜子指指点点的，有帮屠夫卡住你的，还有携手魂牵太君这边走的。但，游戏要笑着玩！！！（我很开心哈哈哈哈哈嗷嗷嗷嗷，笑你妈！）总的来说，这款游戏真的很值得入手，如果觉得82有些贵了，可以等打折的，几乎最近每两个月都会打一次吧。萌新的话可以加一些开黑群，有人带的话会比较顺利的熟悉这款游戏，如果没有人带只靠自己摸索的话可能会被劝退。只是我在steam上发表的第一个评测，本人也比较喜欢带新人，如果找不到游戏导师的话可以加我（女留ID男自强哈哈）最后留一个开黑群号吧：921314760，帮苦逼群主宣传一下嘿嘿，群里氛围挺好的。最后，当你把这个恐怖游戏玩成竞技游戏甚至搞笑游戏的时候，你就大成了。
太刺激了末日残兵好技能就熬死队友无脑跑
Fajna gra można się świetnie bawić w grupie i niezwykle wciągająca. Mroczny świetny klimat i duży wybór bohaterów. Za to polecam cierpliwość w grze :D
En mi humilde opinion, a los creadores de este juego les importa mas la plata que la comunidad, son un asco :).

(I'm foreign so if my grammar sucks you'll know why.) 

Let's get started.

The game itself.

I don't know if this game just isn't for me or what it is but I hate it. I hate that it's so rarely when you can feel accomplished in this game as a survivor since it is so difficult to outplay the killer unless he's a moron. I wanna play this game with my friends but i feel like killer is a lot more fun since YOU can hunt down people and kill them, still not that feeling of accomplishment or outplaying people but atleast It's better. Untill that since you're not that experienced of a player and you end up getting tbagged and flashlighted constantly. I wanna play this game with my friends but I just don't feel like that survivor is engaging enough at all. You stand a big chunk of the game just focusing generators and the other is getting chased by the killer, while using pallets untill they eventually catch up to you and kill you, where you now have to rely on your teammates not to fuck up and save you, AND save you at the right time. If you want the feeling that a game should give, there are much better games out there. Fuck this game is dogshit garbage ass and there's no excitement, it might just be me being depressed but i hate it and i always had. I tried to get myself to like it but i just couldn't. This is not just a hate comment after losing a game of it, I actually haven't played this game in like 3 months so I don't know if the game has majorly changed. But if it's still the same base game and It's just new killers and survivors that has come out, the game is still thrash. I also hate the ammount of frustuation this game gives and how many times you just feel like you can't do shit, and i feel like that you ALWAYS have to be able do something in order win, even if you're on your last legs. You log in to the game thinking that It's gonna be fun but once you get in the game and the first person get hooked, or the killing is host-abusing (or whatever the fuck it's called I don't remember), or if you're just very outmatched skill wise (both as a killer or survivor), or if you can't catch that survivor because of premades or what i mentioned just before. Yeah, you come to a realisation that hehe, IT'S NOT VERY FCKING FUN.

The ranking system. 

If there's something in this game there's supposed to give you a sense of accomplishment it would have to be the ranking system. But there is one tiny problem with it. It's way too fucking easy. Let me explain. You barely ever lose any progress when loosing compared to how often and how much you gain rank points. Now when I had played this game for like 50 hours I was already at rank 8, RANK 8? I felt like that rank didn't even matter since it was so easy to gain, and I don't know if they've changed the ranking system or if people just are using third-party systems like in CS:GO now, but if that hasn't became a thing (atleast not for the newer players) well yeah you guessed it, I don't like it. I also don't know if this has changed but yeah as i said earlier you (pretty often) get mismatched so much skill-wise and it pisses me off, so I hope this has changed.

My final words.

I don't like the game and I don't know if I'm just grumpy or If i just hate the survival horror game genre (since I also dislike Friday 13th: The Game) but I don't and I never have, the only reason why I have played this game is because of my friends. But with that said. I've only played this game for 89 hours and I haven't played it at all in the last two weeks so I could be wrong, but let me know if you disagree. If the game has become better or if I'm wrong at some point. Let me know because in that case, I wouldn't mind trying this game again.

P.S.
I'm sorry this is so long and I might have repeated myself but I'm too lazy to check it or do anything about it.

I have been playing Dead by Daylight since 2015 when it was released. The game has went through many different changes, fixes, patches, updates, etc. for better and worse at times. This 4vs1 is an asymmetric horror survival game so if these type of games peak your interest then I highly recommend checking out some content on the game and it goes on sale quite often.

当然每个人都会有脑溢血的时候

There are games where you can tell that the devs really put their blood, sweat, and tears into making the game the best it could be.

This isn't one of those games.

This game sorely needs balancing and reworks that actually address the problems that exist (and have existed for... quite some time).
-Some killers are hot garbage, while others are like taking a gun to a knife fight. Both killers and survivors have nuclear options that can kill any fun the other side might have.
-Some perks are a complete joke, while others are so useful that you'll see them in 90% of matches. Again. And again. And again.
-Matchmaking is even more of a dumpster fire than usual.
-Events have been lackluster/nonexistent, and the newest Halloween event (you know, kind of the flagship holiday for a horror game) was... well, not really an event, because "event" implies content. 

And meanwhile, the devs have been ignoring community feedback and just pumping out cosmetics and changes that do nothing. (Or make other, unrelated things bug out)

The game is doing okay as it is, yes. But it could be great. And until it is, I'd advise you wait til either they fix it, or it's on sale for cheap.

Also: Cosmetics are hella expensive, in a game that isn't F2P. You have been warned.

Edit: With the release of the buggy, unfinished mess that is Chapter 18, the devs have made clear what their priorities are. And now my advice is: just stay away. It'll be far less painful and there are other fish in the sea.
